com.amazon.speech.speechlet

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.speechlet.User

  • public class User
extends Object
    The User tied to a Speechlet Session is the user registered to the device initiating the Speechlet Session and contains a unique identifier.
    See Also:
    Speechlet, Session, SpeechletException
